Beijing Sunshine Geo-Tech

Beijing Sunshine Geo-tech Co., Ltd. (SGT) is a leading technology and service company for oil & gas industry in China. We provides consulting services and product solutions throughout the oil & gas exploration and production life cycle.

Company Overview

Found in 2008, SGT has experienced a strong growth in the recent years. The company currently employs more than 120 geoscientists, engineers, and data management expertise, led by 20 highly experienced project leaders. A successful oil & gas services business requires an experienced management team, an innovative R&D team and a good technical enabled and efficient service team. In order to raise our services capabilities to world class level, SGT has been continuously investing its people development program, as well as building it internal training program, integration committee, QC committee and R&D committee. Powered by people’s expertise and constant investment in innovation, we are recognized by the government as a High Tech Company (certification) in Beijing China.

As an integration technology provider, SGT provides integrated technologies and services from very beginning of its business life. We aim to build our knowledge base around the world and provides unique integrated G&G services, production & engineering services, and data & information solutions to our customers for better oil & gas discovery, production enhancement, and improved engineering performance efficiency.

SGT believes knowledge accumulation is fundamental for oil & gas business. Technology selection and integrated ways of asset evaluation is the key for successful exploration and production. Based on our people’s experiences and company’s cumulated knowledge base, SGT integrates proven technology into innovative workflow that helped our clients with geological understanding, data management, and production optimization. By using these robust, science-based solutions, SGT has completed hundreds consultant projects.

Core Business

SGT provides leading technologies to the Chinese market, we have developed an extensive knowledge and solution workflows in the areas of geological & geophysical study, information & data management, production optimization & reservoir management, engineering design & well services.

Geological & GeoPhysical study

SGT provides unique solutions for different areas of exploration. By integrating top technologies from different vendor, SGT has built its own data QC, processing and interpretation solution, workflows and methodologies for exploration, which brings new perspective and understanding for both conventional and unconventional resources.

Information & Data management

The ability to access and analysis massive data from different sources is important for any exploration and production project. SGT has been developing customized data management system for our clients for many years. With a strong effort from our research & development team, SGT has developed tools such as, GDP, a powerful exploration data management platform, and HWCAD, a horizontal well design toolkit.
